mapper.select: select * from DMEXAM.students where STUDENT_ID = #{student_id} and PASSWORD = #{password}

select c.course_name as course_name, t.teacher_name as teacher_name, s.score as score, c.course_id, t.teacher_id, s.score_id from DMEXAM.SCORES s left join DMEXAM.COURSES c on s.course_id = c.course_id left join DMEXAM.TEACHERS t on t.teacher_id = c.teacher_id WHERE STUDENT_ID = #{studentId};
select count(*) from DMEXAM.SCORES s left join DMEXAM.COURSES c on s.course_id = c.course_id left join DMEXAM.TEACHERS t on t.teacher_id = c.teacher_id WHERE STUDENT_ID = #{studentId};
